content.text:
# Wester Ross, Strathpeffer and Lochalsh (ward)

he Boundary Commission for Scotland is responsible for reviews of UK Parliament constituencies in Scotland. |url=http://www.lgbc-scotland.gov.uk/5th-reviews-ward-maps |website=boundaries.scot |access-date=23 July 2021 |archive-date=20 March 2020 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20200320103543/http://www.lgbc-scotland.gov.uk/5th-reviews-ward-maps |url-status=dead }}
| alt1     = Location of the ward
}}Wester Ross, Strathpeffer and Lochalsh is one of the twenty-one wards used to elect members of the Highland Council.  It includes the towns and villages of Gairloch, Lochalsh, Strathpeffer and Ullapool. It elects four Councillors.
